channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 13:15 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 13:15 Dumping anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 13:11 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapets Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 13:11 Alarm to the Kharkiv region.
